title: Deactivated Probe
summaries: The Deactivated Probe is a pet-summoning item dropped from The Destroyer in Master Mode with a 1/4 (25%) chance. It summons a small version of The Destroyer named Destroyer-Lite as a pet that follows the player around.

statistics.Tooltip:
Summons miniature mechanical eyes
'Two are better than one.'
statistics.Sell: 5 GC
